sentences.en: A new kid on the markup language block is eXtensible markup language.
sentences.cn: 语言块中的新成员是扩展标记语言.

sentences.en: A parameter entity reference is not allowed in internal markup.
sentences.cn: 内部标记中不允许使用参数实体引用.

sentences.en: Eliminate the reseller's markup and pass the savings on to the customers.
sentences.cn: 去除转销商这一层的钱,并把省下的钱还给用户.

sentences.en: Extensible Markup Language ( XML ) takes Web document formatting a giant leap forward.
sentences.cn: XML使网络文件格式化发生了一次巨大的飞跃.

sentences.en: For those who don't know, XL stands for Extensible Markup Language.
sentences.cn: 对于那些不知道的人来说, XML是 “可扩展标记语言”的缩写.

sentences.en: SMIL ( Synchronized Multimedia Integration Language ) is an important application of XML ( Extensible Markup Language ).
sentences.cn: SMIL ( 同步多媒体集成语言 ) 是XML ( 可扩展标记语言 ) 的一种重要应用.

sentences.en: Standard Generalized Markup Language ( SGML ) is used to mark the logic structure of text.
sentences.cn: 标准通用置标语言 ( SGML ) 是用来标记文件逻辑结构的语言.

sentences.en: The content of elements must consist of well - formed character data or markup.
sentences.cn: 元素的内容必须包括格式字符数据或标记.

sentences.en: The Extensible Markup Language ( XML ) became a W 3 C Recommendation 10. February 1998.
sentences.cn: 1998年2月10日,扩展标记语言 ( XML ) 成为W3C推荐使用的标准.

sentences.en: The Extensible Markup Language ( XML ) is NOT a replacement for HTML.
sentences.cn: 扩展标记语言 ( XML ) 并不是HTML的替代品.

sentences.en: The programming interface for UDDI is based on Extensible Markup Language ( XML ).
sentences.cn: UDDI的编程界面是基于扩展标注语言 ( XML ) 的.

sentences.en: The progression price markup system has been a controversial issue.
sentences.cn: 采用级数价格的系统是有争议的事项.

sentences.en: The research introduces extensible markup language ( XML : extensible Markup Language ).
sentences.cn: 研究介绍了可扩展标记语言 ( XML:eXtensibleMarkupLanguage ).

sentences.en: This mean that international delivery will line markup from today.
sentences.cn: 这意味着国际快递将从今天起全线涨价.

sentences.en: We all know that most wine in restaurants is over-priced: a markup of 200 percent on cost is considered normal.
sentences.cn: 我们都知道饭店中大部分葡萄酒标价过高：在成本价上涨200％被认为是正常的。

sentences.en: Where can I go to verify my document uses correct markup?
sentences.cn: 我在哪里可以验证文档所使用的标记是否正确?

phrases.tran_cn: 超文本标记语言；超文本置标语言

trans.tran_cn: （在成本的基础上）加价，利润，赢利
trans.tran_en: A markup is an increase in the price of something, for example the difference between its cost and the price that it is sold for
